mapper.insert: insert into member(me_id, me_pw, me_name, me_gender, me_birth, me_address, me_phone) values(#{user.me_id},#{user.me_pw},#{user.me_name},#{user.me_gender}, #{user.me_birth},#{user.me_address},#{user.me_phone})
mapper.update: update member set me_pw = #{user.me_pw}, me_name = #{user.me_name}, me_birth = #{user.me_birth}, me_address = #{user.me_address}, me_gender = #{user.me_gender}, me_phone = #{user.me_phone}, me_authority = #{user.me_authority} where me_id = #{user.me_id}
mapper.select: select * from member where me_authority != '슈퍼 관리자'
